Who Forest.requires: ({YamlDisabled(key_preference)} AND |Who Forest Access Key|) OR ({YamlEnabled(acess_preference)} AND |Progressive Area Access Key:1|)

Who Dump.requires: ({YamlDisabled(key_preference)} AND |Who Dump Access Key|) OR ({YamlEnabled(key_preference)} AND |Progressive Area Access Key:2|)

Who Lake.requires: ({YamlDisabled(key_preference)} AND |Who Lake Access Key|) OR ({YamlEnabled(key_preference)} AND |Progressive Area Access Key:3|)
